artworks.title: HexVR Logo - V3
artworks.fullDescription: The third iteration of a logo created for the game HexVR. Created in Adobe Illustrator. The logo blends styles such as Art Deco, Modern Athletic, and Fantasy.

artworks.title: Titan Poster
artworks.fullDescription: A poster of Saturn's largest moon, Titan. Made in Adobe Illustrator. Inspired by NASA space travel posters.

artworks.title: HexVR 'Rivals' Poster
artworks.fullDescription: A poster for the game HexVR of the two opposing teams. Made in IbisPaintX and Photoshop.

artworks.title: Minecraft Ender Dragon
artworks.fullDescription: An illustration of the Minecraft Ender Dragon sitting on an obsidian pillar. Made by importing physical lineart into IbisPaintX. You can see my old signature in the corner.

artworks.title: Comm. for @gblnszn
artworks.fullDescription: Logo for X Esports, commissioned by @gblnszn on Discord. Made in Adobe Illustrator.

artworks.title: Olympus Mons Travel Poster
artworks.fullDescription: A fake travel poster for Olympus Mons, the largest mountain in our solar system located on the planet Mars. Made in Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop. I was inspired by fake travel posters made by NASA for moons and exoplanets.

artworks.title: Paris Prom Poster
artworks.fullDescription: A Paris-themed prom poster for Greater Atlanta Christian School. Commissioned by The GAC Prom Committee. Made using Adobe Illustrator and Photoshop.

artworks.title: Pointing Knight
artworks.fullDescription: A digital painting of a fantasy medieval knight. Painted with charcoal brushes in Procreate and colored using gradient maps. The proportions are a little off but I'm still very proud of how it turned out.

artworks.title: Astra Navigant Logo
artworks.fullDescription: A logo created for the concept brand Astra Navigant. Made in Adobe Illustrator.

artworks.title: ULTRAKILL Gabriel Fan Poster
artworks.fullDescription: A digital illustration of a poster of Gabriel from the game ULTRAKILL. Drawn in Procreate and rendered in IbisPaintX. One of my favorite pieces I've done so far.

artworks.title: RIOT Poster
artworks.fullDescription: a poster of some random stuff i threw together when i was bored idk. Created in Procreate.

artworks.title: Doctor - Face Study
artworks.fullDescription: A young man with glasses I made while studying faces and shading. Drawn in Procreate.
